intents._comment: this tag for varsity hall information.
patterns: is there any hall for girls
responses:
Hall Facilities:
>Smart Living Scope.
>Close to the Class.
>Leadership Development.
>Cost-Effective Living Option.
>Enjoying the Wireless Life.
>Safety & Security.

In-room Facility:
>One Bed per Student shall be offered.
>Fully furnished rooms with beds & underbed drawers.
>Study tables & Chair.
>Laundry Service.
>Filter Water facility to be provided.
>Medical facility available with first aid/ provided to sick Residents.
>Electricity Facility in each room.
>Generator facility available (Need Based).
>Common Room.
>Indoor games like carrom , chess, table tennis etc.
>Each room is shared by four students. A bed, reading table, chair, fan, light will provide by Hall authority. Students have to bring their own mattress, bed sheets, quilt, pillow etc. Each room is 300sqf. A corridor is front in the room (common) and a separate veranda in each room.

Contact:
>Male Hall(YKSG-1):01847334956
>Male Hall(YKSG-2):01896034256
>Female Hall(RASG):01896034255
>Email: hall@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd

patterns: Can you outline the procedure for reserving a hall seat on campus?
how can i get seat on hall?
how to apply for hall seat?
where i apply for hall seat booking?
how to apply for hall seat?
Where can students find detailed instructions on the hall admission process?
Could you provide information on how students can apply for hall admission?
What is the process for booking a hall seat for the upcoming academic term?
Is there a specific online portal or platform where students can submit their hall seat applications?
What documentation or forms are required for students to apply for hall admission?
responses:
Admission Eligibility:
>Regular Students of DIU.
>Minimum SGP: 2.5 in case of Readmission/existing students.
No Accusation/ Conviction from University or Government.

Hall Fees (Effect from Spring 2024):
>Per regular seat cost is BDT- 3500/- (Per month). But mode of the payment will be semester wise and advance.
>Registration fee: BDT- 3000/- (One time admission fee, not applicable in every semester).
>Fee for students: BDT- 21000/- (for 6 month).
>A new student has to pay BDT- 24000/- only in 1st semester and after that BDT- 21000/- in every semester.
>The Hall payment should be done during academic registration (beginning in the semester).

Payment Procedure:
>You can deposit money Accounts section, at DSC or pay through the student Hall portal using.
>(Bkash, Rocket, DBBL Nexus, VISA/Master/Amex Card, IBBL, Nagad, Upay, Mkash, Ok wallet).

Apply for a seat [CLICK HERE](https://hall.diu.edu.bd/web/login)

Seat Booking Guidelines [CLICK HERE](https://hall.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/hall-portal.html)

Contact:
>Male Hall(YKSG-1):01847334956
>Male Hall(YKSG-2):01896034256
>Female Hall(RASG):01896034255
>Email: hall@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd

>Air conditioner

Benefits Of Using University Buses/Transport:
>Always on time
>Safe and time-consuming

To get bus schedules for different routes and more information[CLICK HERE](https://daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/article/transport)

patterns: is there any trainer for gym?
responses:
The management of DIU provides the gymnasium facility for students and employees.

Monthly Fees (Tk):
>Students:1000/-
>Teachers:1000/-
>Officials:1000/-

1.There will be a total of 8 sessions during University hours (from 9 AM to 5 PM), of which 2 will be exclusively for female students and the remaining 6 for male students. The time limit of each session will be one hour.
2.There will be a single session after office hours exclusively for teachers and officials. Duration of the evening session will be 3 hours (from 5PM to 8PM).

Contact Persons:
Ms. Sanjida Amin Shila
Student Counselor
shila@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd
Cell: 01713493039

tell me  about diu medical service

responses:
Medical Facilities:
General primary checkup 
Blood pressure checkup
Blood sugar checkup
Primary Surgery
Emergency Medicine
IV normal saline
Dressing (Massive)
Dressing (General)
Oxygen inhalation
Nebulize
Ambulance Service 24/7.
Doctor appoint fee 50/-

Medical service will be available 7 (Seven) days in a week, other than weekly and govt holidays.Time of providing services from 8.00 am to 12.00 am.

Emergency Contact:
>Email of DIU Medical Center: diumc@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd
>Medical Center Hotline Number: 01847140120
>Ambulance Hotline Number:  01847334999

More service information[CLICK HERE](https://daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/medical/medical-center-collaboration)

patterns: does the varsity have library facility
responses:
AB04:3rd Floor
The purpose of the DIU library is to support academic and research activities. The library carries out its mission by Fulfilling the course related needs of undergraduates, Meeting the scholarly needs of graduate students and faculty members, Providing users with access to materials located inside the library system and lot more.

During The Semester
Sat to Thurs
8.00 AM to 8.00 PM
Friday
8.00 AM to 4.00 PM

During Off Semester
Sat to Thurs
8.00 AM to 4.00 PM
Friday
CLOSED

Quick Contacts
Head of The Library
librarian@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd
IP Phone: 65266

Circulation Desk
IP Phone: 65267

Research and Reference Support & Remote Access Permission
library1@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd
More details [CLICK HERE](https://library.daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/)
